name: Cake Game
description:
"Cake Game" is a sweet puzzle game that combines strategy and fun. Your mission is to drop various pastries and cakes into a jar, aiming to combine similar treats to create bigger, more scrumdiddlyumptious delights. With each successful combination, you'll be one step closer to achieving the ultimate pastry: the Legendary Papa Cake! But beware, space is limited, and you'll need to plan your moves carefully to avoid running out of room in the pastry display.

The game has three levels of difficulty: easy, medium, and hard. Make a Mama Cake and Papa Cake to get the Steam achievements. Achieve high scores and get on the global leaderboard.

Immerse yourself in a world where the visuals are as enticing as the gameplay and accompanied by a lighthearted and engaging soundtrack.

Whether you’re a puzzle lover or a pastry lover, "Cake Game" is sure to satisfy your hunger. So, use your strategic mind and dive into a world where confectioneries and puzzles collide!
